title: SMC, the million-dollar question
message:
Hi, is there a way of knowing which model of Mac an SMC belongs to, without mounting it ?
I' ve a lot of LM4FS1EH and i know they belongs to AIR from 2013 (2014 ?) to 2017 or Pro retina.....

title: SMC, the million-dollar question
message:
Not a real solution.
Part of marking shows the manufacture date.
A chip manufactured in 2015, can't be used in earlier machine.

You need to solder it and test if works properly.
As an example, 3437 SMC can work in 00165 and viceversa; but weird issues can appear.

I soldered once wrong SMC in a Retina Pro and I got missing 1/3 bottom part of image.
The problem was fixed puting correct SMC there.
